sentences.sContent: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.sCn: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.sContent: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.sCn: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.sContent: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.sCn: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

sentences.sContent: ...robots can have trouble making decisions in complex scenarios...
...As robots take on ever more complex roles...
...analytic reasoning and other higher-level skills that are necessary to thrive in today's knowledge-based economy and to lead our nation in a time of complex challenges and dynamic change...
...It's a "spoken" language that is getting richer and more complex by the year...
...But the damage to skill and craftsmanship- that's needed to build a complex airliner or a tractor...
...in which they develop the wide range of complex reasoning abilities required of good lawyers...
...all these complex measures had the same psychological purpose: to reassure people that the free fall would stop and...

trans.tranCn: 由许多部分组成的，复合的；复杂的，难懂的
